Fighters.Name: Dr. Sattler
Fighters.Text: After Dr. Sattler or Dr. Malcolm move, place an insight token in their new space. You have 5 insight tokens.

Fighters.Name: Dr. Malcolm
Fighters.Text: After Dr. Sattler or Dr. Malcolm move, place an insight token in their new space. You have 5 insight tokens.

Card.Name: Woman Inherits the Earth
Card.Key: Dr. Ellie Sattler_Woman Inherits the Earth
Card.Text: Immediately: Draw 1 card. Dr Sattler recovers health equal to the number of insight tokens on the board. Remove all insight tokens from the board.

Card.Name: Violently, If Necessary
Card.Text: After combat: Deal 2 damage to each opposing fighter on or adjacent to a space with an insight token.

Card.Name: Sexism in Survival Situations
Card.Key: Dr. Ellie Sattler_Sexism in Survival Situations
Card.Text:
During combat: If the opposing fighter is a hero, the value of this card is 4 instead.
After combat: You may move Dr. Sattler 1 space.

Card.Name: Chaotician
Card.Text: After combat: Place an insight token in any space.

Card.Name: Life Finds a Way
Card.Key: Dr. Ellie Sattler_Life Finds a Way
Card.Text: After combat: Your opponent discards the top card of their deck. Dr. Malcolm and Dr. Sattler recover health equal to that card's BOOST value.

Card.Name: The Future Ex-Mrs. Malcolm
Card.Key: Dr. Ellie Sattler_The Future Ex-Mrs. Malcolm
Card.Text: Draw 2 cards. Place an insight token in Dr. Malcolm's space. Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: Must Go Faster
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, you may place Dr. Malcolm and Dr. Sattler in any space.

Card.Name: I Think We're Back In Business
Card.Key: Dr. Ellie Sattler_I Think We're Back In Business
Card.Text: During combat: The value of this card is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Card.Script: ../Dr. Ellie Sattler/I Think We're Back In Business.lua

Card.Name: Lock The Doors!
Card.Text: After combat: Deal 2 damage to the opposing fighter. Move your fighter up to 2 spaces.

Card.Name: Hey! Hey! Hey!
Card.Text: After combat: Move your other fighter up to 4 spaces.

Card.Name: The Concept of Attraction
Card.Key: Dr. Ellie Sattler_The Concept of Attraction
Card.Text: After combat: You may place your fighter on any space with an insight token.

Card.Name: Feint
Card.Text: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

Card.Name: Regroup
Card.Text: After combat: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.

Card.Name: You Never Had Control, That's the Illusion
Card.Key: Dr. Ellie Sattler_You Never Had Control, That's the Illusion
Card.Text: During combat: Increase the value of this card by the number of insight tokens on the board. Remove all insight tokens from the board.
Card.Script: ../Dr. Ellie Sattler/You Never Had Control, That's the Illusion.lua
